stimulusHtml: Toxicologists say, “the dose makes the poison,” meaning that most substances are harmful in high enough concentrations. The data for anastrozole

features.html:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by five suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The following questions refer to the graph below showing the relationship between the induction of cancer in breast cells and the concentration of anastrozole.

choicesHtml: supports this concept because as concentration increases, so does response
supports this concept because as concentration increases, response decreases
does not support this concept because as concentration increases, response increases
does not support this concept because as concentration increases, response decreases
does not support this concept because the experiment was not done in animals
